author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Sixth Additional District Sessions Court, Coimbatore, awarded five years rigorous imprisonment to Mylsamy and Raghuraman for circulating counterfeit currency. A release from the Counterfeit Currency Wing Police said that they had arrested the two on January 8, 2014 in the Ukkadam bus stand, where they were moving around under suspicious circumstances trying to exchange 39 counterfeit notes in Rs. 500 denominations.

The court also slapped fine Rs. 1,000 on each of the accused.
title: Two get jail term
